funding-group.funding-statement: This research was supported by the Agency for Healthcare Research and Quality (1K08 HS019816, Dr. Khazeni). See http://www.ahrq.gov/. The Southern California Permanente Medical Group provided support in the form of a salary for author MG, but did not have any additional role in the study design, data collection and analysis, decision to publish, or preparation of the manuscript. The specific roles of these authors are articulated in the ‘author contributions’ section.
